label: Calculations
description: for calculations, primarily for infrastructure

label: Certificate
description: for all certificates including completion certificates and certificates of compliance

label: Contract
description: for contracts between any parties relevant to the project

label: Design Change Request
description: including engineering and field change requeists

label: Drawing
description: drawings including floor, site and roof plans, elevations, sections, details, layouts, etc.

label: Data Sheet
description: product data sheets, technical literature and manufacturer's information for specific assets

label: Interface Coordination Document
description: for interface coordination documents between two or more parties, including D/CIM (Design and Construction Interface Manual) but excluding CSD.

label: Image
description: for all photographic records and images

label: Invoice
description: for documents detailing the cost of project activities during a month

label: Interface Record
description: for project interface document between two or more arties (not already covered by ICD).

label: Manual
description: manuals including O&M manuals for system, plant and equipment

label: Model File
description: for all 3D and BIM related files

label: Method Statement
description: all work method statements including safety work method statements

label: No Objection Certificate
description: for all type of certificates and permits issued during the course of the project.

label: Programme
description: all project programmes/planning documents

label: Proposal
description: for any proposal relevant to the project, in response to a specific RFP (Request for Proposal)

label: Photographs
description: for all photographs including aerial images

label: Plan
description: all plan documentation including project plans, design plans and execution plans

label: Policy
description: for all project-related and relevant external or third party policies and guidelines

label: Procedure
description: for all relevant process and procedure documentation

label: Register
description: for registers and lists including but all asset and equipment registers

label: Request for Information
description: for all requests for information

label: Request for Proposal
description: request for proposal documents describing general, particular and technical requirements of the works to enable third parties to tender

label: Report
description: Reports including weekly, inspection, monthly, PCG, cost reports, etc.

label: Schedule
description: schedules including window, door, finishes and hardware schedules

label: Safety Notice
description: for safety notices issued on the project

label: Sketch
description: Sketch/Exhibit drawing

label: Sample
description: for all documents related to samples and the sample approval process

label: Scope of Works
description: for all scopes of work documentation

label: Specification
description: all specifications including hardware, equipment and design specifications

label: Shop Drawing
description: all shop drawings produced by the subcontractors and head contractor

label: Survey
description: data and drawings produced by the subcontractors and head contractor

label: Technical Note
description: for technical description of a technique or procedure, including modificaiton of a technique, procedure or equipment

label: Tender
description: documents describing general, particular and technical requirements of the works to enable third parties to tender

label: Warranty
description: for all plant and equipment warranties and guarantees
